name: RAPID OCEAN RESPONSE CORP.
description: Provide marine firefighting and emergency response services to vessels along US coastline.
sampleDescriptions: Raising awareness with the congressional committees of jurisdiction and the United Sates Coast Guard as to the safety needs for maritime firefighting response.
